participant_1.background:
My family is the most important thing in my life.
my parents have been married for 40 years.
i am fascinated with ghosts.
i drink beers and go to the creek.
I enjoy strong female characters in my movies.

participant_2.background:
I am raising my kids on my own.
i am a psychology major.
i am too short to reach the top shelf.
i am angry at my coworker.
My pets are a good way to keep my mind off of my divorce.

content.text: Hey there! I am not a believer, but I have to admit that I get a little creeped out sometimes.
I am a psychology major, so I like to look at things from a scientific perspective.
I think there's more to it than that. I think there's a lot of unexplained things in the world.
I agree that there are some unexplained things in the world. I just don't think ghosts are one of them.
I guess we will just have to agree to disagree.
I am just curious though. What kind of things have you experienced that make you believe in ghosts?
Well, I've never seen a ghost, but I've felt a presence a few times.
I have never felt a presence, but I have heard some interesting stories.
Me too! I think it's all so fascinating.
I do too. It's a shame that science hasn't been able to prove or disprove the existence of ghosts.
I agree. I think it would be amazing if we could.
I wonder what we would learn if we could.
I think we would learn a lot about the world and about ourselves.
I think you're right. It would be a really interesting discovery.
